com.communote.server.core.vo.query.note

Class SimpleNoteListItemToDiscussionNoteDataConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.communote.server.core.vo.query.QueryResultConverter<I,O>
      • com.communote.server.core.vo.query.note.DataAccessNoteConverter<SimpleNoteListItem,O>
        • com.communote.server.core.vo.query.note.SimpleNoteListItemToNoteDataQueryResultConverter<DiscussionNoteData>
          • com.communote.server.core.vo.query.note.SimpleNoteListItemToDiscussionNoteDataConverter

  • public class SimpleNoteListItemToDiscussionNoteDataConverter
extends SimpleNoteListItemToNoteDataQueryResultConverter<DiscussionNoteData>
    Converter which creates DiscussionNoteData objects. Depending on the given TimelineFilterViewType the converter will add the comments of the note to the data object. In that case it will ignore any note in the input list that is not a root note.
    Author:
    Communote GmbH - http://www.communote.com/ *

    • Constructor Summary

      Creates a new converter which converts root notes of discussions into a data object that also holds all the comments of the discussion sorted by a given order.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SimpleNoteListItemToDiscussionNoteDataConverter

        public SimpleNoteListItemToDiscussionNoteDataConverter(NoteRenderContext noteRenderContext,
                                                       TimelineFilterViewType timelineFilterViewType,
                                                       NoteQueryParameters queryParameters)
        Creates a new converter which converts root notes of discussions into a data object that also holds all the comments of the discussion sorted by a given order. The comments will be empty if the provided view type is TimelineFilterViewType.CLASSIC.
        Parameters:
        noteRenderContext - The rendering context. If the render mode of the context is null, no NoteRenderingPreProcessors will be called.
        timelineFilterViewType - The timeline filter type which defines how the comments of a note should be sorted (threaded or chronologically by creation date starting with oldest). In case the type is TimelineFilterViewType.CLASSIC the comments won't be filled.
        queryParameters - The parameters are needed to load missing elements for TimelineFilterViewType.COMMENT. It can be null, if not COMMENT is used.

    • Method Detail

      • convert

        public PageableList<DiscussionNoteData> convert(PageableList<SimpleNoteListItem> queryResult)
        Converts the temporary object of the query to a list object

        In addition to simple loading, this also checks for DM's which might alter the result. And performs additional queries for this.

        Overrides:
        convert in class QueryResultConverter<SimpleNoteListItem,DiscussionNoteData>
        Parameters:
        queryResult - the temporary object returned by the executed query
        Returns:
        the pageable list object

      • setCommentMatcher

        public void setCommentMatcher(Matcher<NoteData> commentMatcher,
                              boolean filter)
        Sets a matcher to mark comments, if loadComments is set to true.
        Parameters:
        commentMatcher - The matcher to set.
        filter - If true only matching comments will be returned, else all comments will be returned and matching comments will be marked as matched.
